column3: When we don't have any dependency(after f4a27e8) we should use ModificationTracker.NEVER_CHANGED instead empty array.
Maybe we should  move this file and JavaCoreProjectEnvironment.java and something else(?) to Kotlin repo if they don't have other usages. They don't have any usages into intellij-community.
These files are also used by UpSource.
